sys_processor.description:
Sample how to render QRs Example use: /x_snc_qrcode_qrgenerate.do?data=ServiceNow Rocks! Will render a img of a QR Code containing the text ServiceNow Rocks!
URL Parameters: data: text to encode type: type to render, options: imgtag, svgtag, dataurl size: number of the size: default 4 margin: margin of the image
sys_processor.name: qrgenerate
